"Crawford": "We've just detected Dark Falz's signal very close to Lake Halphiria."
"He will arrive soon and begin an invasion."
"I want to ask that you stall for as much time as you can while I ready the Central Cannon."
"I want the rear support squads to be deployed as well."
"I expect you all to fight hard out there."
"Can you read me? It looks like we're going to be fighting some ways away..."
"We're going to provide backup over there."
"We'll support you with everything we've got, so you can fight your heart out!"
"Picking up a high energy signal! Here it comes!"
